cards.title: Amphibious Assault
body: When this card enters play, the {H - 1} villain targets with the lowest HP each deal 3 lightning damage to a different hero target.
At the start of the environment turn, if any hero cards were played this round, play the top card of the villain deck. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: One of the Halcyon Black Teams{BR}attacked during the night, quickly{BR}overrunning the beach.

cards.title: Ancient Parasite
body: At the start of the environment turn, if this card is next to a target, it deals that target {H} toxic damage and moves back to the environment play area. Otherwise it deals Teryx {H + 2} toxic damage.
Whenever this card is dealt damage by a hero target, move it next to that target.
cards.flavorText: Quicksilver's grin faded. Her distraction{BR}had been successful, and the crab{BR}was turning to charge her.

cards.title: Barnacle Hydra
body: When this card is destroyed, it deals Teryx {H} toxic damage.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage. Then, if Submerge is in play, this card regains 6HP.
cards.flavorText: The barnacles' size was{BR}proportionate to their host. But{BR}their temperment was far worse.

cards.title: Exposed Lifeforce
body: When this card enters play, search the environment deck and trash for Teryx and put it into play, then shuffle the deck.
Increase damage dealt by villain cards by 1.
Destroy this card if Teryx regains 10HP in a single round.
cards.flavorText: Apostate plunged his sword into{BR}the gap, and the island shook.{BR}“Your last journey is at hand!”

cards.title: Islandquake
body: At the start of the environment turn, this card deals each target other than Teryx 4 sonic damage. Hero targets which caused Teryx to regain HP since the end of the last environment turn are immune to this damage.
Then, this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: “Hold on to something!” Tempest{BR}cried, as the island tried to{BR}dislodge its numerous passengers.

cards.title: Song of the Deep
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck.
At the start of the environment turn, if Teryx is in play, each player may draw a card. Then, if there are at least 2 creatures in play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The ancient island's song sounded{BR}through the waters, the echoes{BR}dying away unanswered.

cards.title: Submerge
body: When this card enters play, search the environment deck and trash for Teryx and put it into play, then shuffle the deck.
Reduce all damage dealt by 2.
At the start of the environment turn, this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: With no warning, Teryx plunged{BR}beneath the icy waves. Ra held his{BR}breath and cursed inwardly.

cards.title: Teryx
body: This card is indestructible. If this card reaches 0HP, the heroes lose.
At the end of the environment turn, the villain target with the highest HP deals Teryx {H + 2} energy damage.
Whenever a hero target would deal damage to Teryx, Teryx Instead regains that much HP.
cards.flavorText: “Say hello to my little friend,” Baccarat chuckled. The mountains themselves trembled and began to rise slowly out of the waves far below.

cards.title: Through the Hurricane
body: Whenever a target enters play, this card deals {H - 1} lightning damage to the target with the third highest HP.
At the start of the environment turn, you may play the top 2 cards of the environment deck. If you do, this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: Quicksilver crouched low, wishing{BR}she was less conductive as the{BR}lightning flashed over the ocean.

cards.title: Timed Detonator
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck.
At the start of the environment turn, this card deals Teryx 10 fire damage and each hero target {H - 2} fire damage. Then, this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: As Quicksilver whirled, frantically trying{BR}to locate him, Ambuscade's chuckle{BR}faded into the ruins. “Turtle soup is{BR}back on the menu.”
